thread.section_title: BIGWORDS.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BIGWORDS.com | bigwords.com
thread.title: schultzie

author: schultzie
title: schultzie
text:
I love BIGWORDS, I especially love that you can now scan the barcode of the book, makes me look much less suspicious when standing in the bookstore!
I wish there was a way to only buy certain items on your list, and save the other items for a purchase another time. Maybe a wishlist, to allow us to collect all the books we could ever want to read, but order them a few at a time.
